biography: George N. Martin was an American television, stage, and movie actor who is known for his role as the hotel receptionist in LÃ©on: The Professional. A regular at Providence's Trinity Repertory Company, he was nominated for a Tony Award in 1983 for his role in David Hare's Plenty. He was born on August 15, 1929 in New York City, New York.
